But he goes on to state that in specimens 
of muscle infested with these entozoa, many 
of the capillaries and minute vessels are 
seen filled with organic molecules resembling 
those which are found in the primary 
fasciculi. And this condition of the vessels 
he strangely regards as an abnormal 
condition “not found except in conjunction 
with the earliest stages of the Cysticerci”, &
He therefore looks upon the molecules <s>as<\s>
in question as the same as those in the 
primary fasciculi by whose coalescence 
in the fasciculi the “formation-cells” of 
the Cysticerci are formed. Such vague 
fancies, & based upon such presence, <s>[text?]<\s> and
